schools.name: Scales Mound High School
schools.school-summary: Scales Mound High School, a public school located in Scales Mound, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Scales Mound Community Unit School District 211.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 7 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.district-name: Scales Mound Community Unit School District 211
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Scales Mound Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Scales Mound Elementary School, a public school located in Scales Mound, IL, serves grades PK-5 in the Scales Mound Community Unit School District 211.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 3 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.school-summary: Scales Mound Jr High School, a public school located in Scales Mound, IL, serves grades 6-8 in the Scales Mound Community Unit School District 211.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 8 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
